QuestData.Title: Talbuk Training: Great-Tusk
QuestData.Description: The talbuk is ready for more training, and for this, we will return to its home in Shadowmoon Valley.$B$BOne of the great beasts of this land, Great-Tusk, has taken the valley for his own. Pit your beast against him in combat, and if you should survive, it will have greater confidence in its own abilities.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Great-Tusk while riding your Talbuk-In-Training.
